020import io.papermc.paper.event.player.AsyncChatEvent;
021import net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.plain.PlainTextComponentSerializer;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.MoneyParser;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseMoney;
025import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
026import org.bukkit.event.EventHandler;
027import org.bukkit.event.EventPriority;
028import org.bukkit.event.Listener;
029
030/**
031 * PlayerChatListener
032 *
033 * @author creatorfromhell
034 * @since 0.1.4.0
035 */
036public class PlayerChatListener implements Listener {
037
038  @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
039  public void onInteract(final AsyncChatEvent event) {
040
041    final Player player = event.getPlayer();
042    final MoneyParser parser = new MoneyParser();
043    final String region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(event.getPlayer().getWorld().getName());
044
045    final String message = PlainTextComponentSerializer.plainText().serialize(event.message());;
046    System.out.println("Message: " + message);
047    if(message.contains("parse:")) {
048
049      System.out.println("Parsing");
050      final ParseMoney parsed = parser.parse(region, message.replace("parse:", ""));
051
052      System.out.println("Currency: " + parsed.currency().getIdentifier() + " Amount: " + parsed.amount().toPlainString());
053      player.sendMessage("Currency: " + parsed.currency().getIdentifier() + " Amount: " + parsed.amount().toPlainString());
054    }
055  }
056}
